name: Qzedia
overview:
Qzedia provides a full suite of tools to traffic and manage location-based marketing programs at scale and supports integration with all major ad servers.

Location-Based Digital Marketing - The only carrier-grade ad server designed specifically to create, manage, and track location-based display advertising campaigns, local search and sponsored map icons

Multi-Screen Advertising - High-impact, robust solutions for display advertising for Mobile and the regular Web. Bring together audiences and advertisers across screens using some of the most compelling experiences in digital.

Dynamic “On the Fly” Ad Creation - Customize individual ads in real-time with location information to maximize relevance and performance.

Real-Time Location - Campaigns can be geo-targeted using any location input, including real-time device location, user-entered data, proximity, as well as by neighborhood, airport code, and postal code.

From hyper-local banner ads to location-based coupons, monetize location in real-time.

Mobile Matters More Today Than Yesterday - But Not as Much as Tomorrow

Introduce SMBs and Multi-location Brands to geo location triggered banner advertising today to prepare for a moble world tomorrow.

Specialties: Mobile and Web Technology Partnerships for Media, Real-Time Location Inventory Exchange, Location-Based Ad Serving, Dynamic “On the Fly” Ad Creation

milestones.description: Qzedia joins IAB Canada as a member in Emerging Platforms – Mobile Marketing.
